hero.title: Make it home.
hero.subtitle: Come share in the welcoming, peaceful comfort of our Blessing in the picturesque Lynnwood Gardens Estate.

about.title: About us
description: Tucked away in the quiet, tree-lined streets of Lynnwood Gardens, Blessing@Lynnwood is the perfect spot to unwind after a busy day in Pretoria.
Whether you're here for a school event, a night at the theatre, or an important business trip, you'll find everything you need for a comfortable stay.
Enjoy your own space with self-catering facilities, great Wi-Fi, and secure parking. It's easy, relaxed, and just feels like home.

kitchenette.title: Kitchenette
kitchenette.description: A a fully equipped kitchenette where you can prepare your meals.

entertainment.title: Entertainment
entertainment.description: Diigital streaming of the most popular channels for your your enjoyment.

apartment.title: Apartment
apartment.description: Enjoy the privacy of your own multi-room apartment, perfect for an undisturbed relaxing stay.

wifi.title: WiFi
wifi.description: Fast, free internet access to keep you connected and comfortable.

barbeque.title: Barbeque
barbeque.description: Make the most of warm days with your dedicated barbeque space.

parking.title: Parking
parking.description: We have safe and secure parking for your vehicle.

booking.title: Ready to book your stay?
booking.subtitle: Feel free to check our availability below and book easily.

items.title: Exceptional
items.text: This spacious establishment that offers a seperate lounge, seperate toilet and a full bathroom, is in a safe and good area, close to highways, shops and restaurants...
items.author: Laans

items.title: Could not have asked for more
items.text: An exceptionally spacious and well-fitted-out apartment in an upmarket and secure residential area. I had a lovely stay with very hospitable hosts. Everything and more than I needed. Could not have asked for better!
items.author: Deon

items.title: Superb
items.text: Baie lekker verblyf! Skoon, veilig en gerieflik.
items.author: Gert

info.title: What to know about your stay:

cancellation.title: Cancellation and prepayment
cancellation.text: Cancellation and prepayment policies vary according to accommodation type. Please enter the dates of your stay and check the conditions of your required option.

childPolicies.title: Child Policies
childPolicies.text:
Children older than 12 years are welcome.
Children 17 years and above will be charged as adults at this property.

To see correct prices and occupancy information, please add the number of children in your group and their ages to your search.

cotPolicies.title: Cot and extra bed policies
cotPolicies.text:
12+ years: extra bed upon request at an additional rate of R650 per person / per night.

Prices for extra beds are not included in the total price, and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
The number of extra beds allowed is dependent on the option you choose. Please check your selected option for more information.

There are no cots available at this property.
All extra beds are subject to availability.

ageRestriction.title: Age Restrictions
ageRestriction.text: The minimum age for check-in is 18

quietHours.title: Quiet hours
quietHours.text: Guests must be quiet between 23:00 and 05:00.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.subtitle: You can easily reach us at any of the following:

form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us more about your inquiry...

contactPage.successText: Your message has been sent successfully. We'll get back to you soon.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: At Blessing@Lynnwood, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or book accommodation with us.

informationWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.text: We may collect the following types of information:
informationWeCollect.personalInfo: Personal identification information (name, address, ID number)

howWeUseInfo.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUseInfo.text: We use your information for the following purposes:
howWeUseInfo.processBookings: Process and manage your accommodation bookings
howWeUseInfo.communicate: Communicate with you about your stay
howWeUseInfo.improveServices: Improve our services and customer experience
howWeUseInfo.legal: Comply with legal obligations and requirements

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing
dataSharing.text: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as required by law or to provide the services you have requested.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.text: By booking accommodation with Blessing@Lynnwood, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use our services.

bookingTerms.title: Booking Terms
bookingTerms.text: The following terms apply to all bookings:
bookingTerms.confirmation: All bookings are subject to availability and confirmation
bookingTerms.payment: Full payment is required to secure your booking
bookingTerms.cancellation: Cancellation policies vary by booking type and date
bookingTerms.noShow: No-show bookings may result in forfeiture of payment

guestResponsibilities.title: Guest Responsibilities
guestResponsibilities.text: As a guest, you are responsible for:
guestResponsibilities.respectProperty: Treating the property and its contents with respect
guestResponsibilities.followRules: Following all property rules and local regulations
guestResponsibilities.liability: Any damage caused during your stay
guestResponsibilities.checkInOut: Adhering to check-in and check-out times

propertyRules.title: Property Rules
propertyRules.text: The following rules apply to all guests:
propertyRules.noSmoking: No smoking is permitted on the property
propertyRules.noPets: Pets are not allowed unless specifically approved
propertyRules.noParties: Parties and events are not permitted
propertyRules.quietHours: Quiet hours are enforced between 23:00 and 05:00
propertyRules.maxOccupancy: Maximum occupancy limits must be respected

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.text: Blessing@Lynnwood's liability is limited to the amount paid for your accommodation. We are not responsible for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.text: For questions about these terms, please contact us:

what.title: What Are Cookies?
what.text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better browsing experience and allow us to analyze how our website is used.

types.title: Types of Cookies We Use
types.text: We use different types of cookies for various purposes. You can manage your preferences below:

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors use our website so we can improve it.
analytics.pageViews: Track page views and popular content

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to show you relevant advertisements and track campaign effectiveness.

manage.title: Manage Your Preferences
manage.text: You can change your cookie preferences at any time. Your choices will be saved and applied to future visits.

contact.title: Questions About Cookies?
contact.text: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us:
